content: nothing says spring like a kawaii amigurumi bunny make them floppy-eared or with ears sticking straight up and complete their look with a carrot or flower these bunnies are the perfect addition to a handmade easter basket or a special gift check out my blog post 2 to see step-by-step photos of the making of these spring bunnies also at the make website 3 1 https //www etsy com/ca/listing/279167662/spring-bunnies-crochet-pattern 2 http //allaboutami tumblr com/post/4546656362/springbunnies 3 https //makezine com/2011/04/08/craft_pattern_spring_bunny/
